details.title: Errata: Stable Supervisory-Adaptive Controller for Spinning Satellite using Only Magnetorquers [Jan 09 192-208]
details.abstract: In the above titled paper (ibid., vol. 45, no. 1, pp. 192-208, Jan. 09), there were a number of errors. These errors are corrected here.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
